name: Get exercise
description: Проверяет получение задания по его ID через API.

steps.name: Check that response status code equals to <HTTPStatus.OK: 200>
Check that 'title' equals to 'Reason job feel eye.'

Check that 'description' equals to 'Item year soldier physical left beat apply leg. Player language fight establish. Hand myself picture to wife science imagine. Among meet democratic expect sea relate.'
